property.name: providerName
property.description: The name of a provider.

property.name: group
property.description: A group of related items or entities.

property.name: payload
property.description: The data payload of a message or request.

property.name: localeName
property.description: The name of a locale, such as "en_US" or "de_DE".

property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: identifier
property.description: A unique identifier for an entity.

property.name: getCollection
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'get collection' (list) action of a resource.

property.name: get
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'get single item' action of a resource.

property.name: post
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'create' (POST) action of a resource.

property.name: patch
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'update' (PATCH) action of a resource.

property.name: delete
property.description: An annotation or configuration for the 'delete' (DELETE) action of a resource.

property.name: action
property.description: The specific action to be performed, often within a controller.

property.name: attributes
property.description: A set of key-value pairs describing a product or entity.

property.name: pushNotificationSubscriptions
property.description: A collection of push notification subscriptions.

property.name: isTransactional
property.description: A flag to indicate if a request should be processed within a database transaction.

property.name: errors
property.description: A collection of error objects.

property.name: pushNotificationSubscriptions
property.description: A collection of push notification subscriptions.

property.name: locale
property.description: The locale context for a request or entity, affecting language and regional formats.

property.name: scopes
property.description: A collection of permission scopes that define the access rights of a token or user.

property.name: requestUser
property.description: The user associated with a request.

property.name: resource
property.description: A data entity in a REST API.

property.name: pagination
property.description: An object containing all pagination-related data for a list of results.

property.name: sortings
property.description: A collection of sorting criteria applied to a query.

property.name: httpStatus
property.description: The HTTP status code of a response.

property.name: resources
property.description: A collection of data entities in a REST API.

property.name: errors
property.description: A collection of error objects.

property.name: provider
property.description: A provider of a service or data.

property.name: group
property.description: A group of related items or entities.

property.name: payload
property.description: The data payload of a message or request.

property.name: user
property.description: A user object.

property.name: uuid
property.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

property.name: locale
property.description: The locale context for a request or entity, affecting language and regional formats.

property.name: localeName
property.description: The name of a locale, such as "en_US" or "de_DE".

property.name: code
property.description: A Spryker specific error code.

property.name: status
property.description: A HTTP status code.

property.name: message
property.description: A message providing information, success, or error details.

property.name: type
property.description: The type or category of an entity (e.g., 'allow', 'deny', 'page').

property.description: A set of key-value pairs describing a product or entity.

property.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: reference
property.description: A reference to another resource or definition.

property.name: parameters
property.description: A collection of parameters for a request or operation.

property.description: A collection of permission scopes that define the access rights of a token or user.

property.name: surrogateIdentifier
property.description: A system-generated, non-human-readable unique identifier (like an auto-incrementing ID).

property.name: naturalIdentifier
property.description: A human-readable unique identifier for a resource, such as a user's email.
